tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @maricaoneill @EnvAgencyMids Why is it only now your listening? This has gone on for years for us, for years we have been told it‚Äôs nothing that we‚Äôre imagining it. I don‚Äôt imagine been woke up at 3am choking on the air I have to breathe to stay alive, daily headache sore throat dry itchy eyes

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The odour is getting worse and worse, night by night and has been since 2018. This is not your priority. It can‚Äôt be. If this if you working as hard as you can, then you are inept. This is out of control. #stopthestink

Thank you for covering this utter shambles with appalling regulation by @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA & ZERO support from @PHE_uk . We will NOT be waiting until 2026 for this hell pit to close @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/eFbDwdc4sQ
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Why are you trying to gaslight us? https://t.co/oSdVw23arV

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL 'REALLY PLEASED'? - Sorry, are you nose blind? It stinks, it has all day. Could you live here and be forced to breathe this polluting, poisonous stink?You are not listening to GPs, the local hospital, or the residents. We need action, and by tonight's stink, it isn't happening.

tweets.text:
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL What IS the progress? It absolutely stinks again. Now in all directions. 

So? Answers are needed. We have now had enough. Actions not PR. Actions not pictures. Whatever you are doing IS NOT working. You are destroying my ability to work. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #StopTheStink

@philmackie @BBCSangita @joe9tee @BBCr4today @BBCBreakfast @BBCNews @bbc5live On a daily and nightly basis. We lock ourselves in rooms, keep windows shut. Use air purifiers. Buy air purifiers for each other. We are suffocating.

You have failed in regulating @RedIndustries2  as our health concerns grow - it‚Äôs out of control  #Stopthestink @StinkStopthe BTW it stinks now (again)

tweets.text:
2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today üëá and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG

So @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA Please tell me, If I hit someone once a day and the pain of that assault is transient and brief, does it not count If I do it once a day, every day for a week, a month, a year, two years, three years?
#stopthestink

@StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #StopTheStink @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL - this is just gaslighting via PR. Utterly unbelievable. It is getting WORSE not better. Try LIVING HERE.

We are getting to the point we need to move from our home,I have totally had enough of these excuses/PR https://t.co/A5WbvakpCo

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL I hope you're ready for what is coming. They're killing us.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Why has it taken you so long to listen? I‚Äôve nearly lost my mind over where we live. I‚Äôve had to leave my home with my children on multiple occasions. You‚Äôve discredited all we have reported until it got so loud you had to listen. I‚Äôm exhausted with fighting. Too little VERY late

Dreading another night suffering from toxic gas invading our homes. It‚Äôs like being in a gas chamber! Stop playing it down, this is an environmental emergency! It‚Äôs getting worse by the day!üò¢ @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @DailyMailUK @BBCNews @BorisJohnson @PHE_uk https://t.co/bZV90iGeyY

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You could close it if you chose. RI are grossly incompetent & have no scruples. In order to wind the place down & in view of their mismanagement capping should be passed to a reputable operator. This should be the equivalent of putting a hospital or school into special measures

tweets.text: @poppers82 @AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Have you read their latest report dated today? March levels generally above WHO Nuisance level but only at danger level 1st weekend of March. No mention of weekend before when they forgot to switch on the machine! @EnvAgency are complicit with @RedIndustries2 without doubt.

@ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Your priority shouldn‚Äôt be reducing its odour, it should be shutting it down.  I heard you say on the ITV report that this would lead to even greater problems as there would be no operator there to manage emissions. Yet the EA has closed other landfill sites in the past.

@AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency It‚Äôs all well and good the suits turning up now, finally. No sign of @EnvAgency  when these odours were being reported during all of last year. The complicit actions of @EnvAgency need to be investigated by a Public Enquiry.

3/5 We‚Äôve now got 4 monitoring stations collecting #airquality data around #WalleysQuarry. 

We‚Äôve shared March data with #health partners to ensure the public have expert advice on the impacts. 

Data, our report & a link to the advice are all here: https://t.co/Hz9p8O6J4n https://t.co/KtCvLJ8Nze

tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Woken 1 am last night, this isn't going away any time soon is it, still can't wait for tomorrow fresh air Friday, you hold them to account.#stopthestink
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Hear from residents?! We‚Äôve been trying to get your to listen since 2018 @StinkStopthe

5/5 Lastly: üôè to those who kindly came to share experiences of living with this odour.

I‚Äôve read & listened to social media, letters to me / @EnvAgencyMids & news reports so have been struck by the #mentalhealth impacts already but hearing from people f2f is always v powerful.

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Beg you come sit in my bedroom right now, 1.3 miles away from the landfill and I‚Äôm sat here HEAVING. I‚Äôm also 4 months pregnant and have a 1 year old in my home. Mental AND physical health problems it‚Äôs causing. Just #StopTheStink and let us breathe! @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

@skinoverbone @networkrail @EnvAgency I reported this to Barnsley council on Sunday (///unite.aspect.chopper). The area is disgusting. Some has been there for a year or more. Why not turn it into a cycle path - useful.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Thanks for the update are you still here? The smell has got exponentially bad in the past hour after being fine all day. My girlfriend is 39wks pregnant and we both feel sick with bad headaches - all happened in past 1hr

@philmackie @joe9tee @BBCr4today @BBCBreakfast @BBCNews @bbc5live Thank you for the excellent coverage, sorry you had to smell the stink. Suns just gone down and the town is stinking off the scale once again üò¢ #stopthestink

tweets.text: @5_News @peterofthelane @5_News Thank you so much for covering this story today. Like many people in the area, I was woken up at 1am this morning due to the stench filling the house. It shouldn‚Äôt be allowed to happen and this coverage may help bring it to an end. @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe

The Westlands right nowü§Æü§Æ
Gut wrenching fumes & throat prickling already. Pray the purifier keeps on top of it & it‚Äôs not another night like last night, we can‚Äôt continue like this @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency
What the hell is plan B?! @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Jeo9w8QEmm

Maybe @ClareDinnisEA could consider staying over here sometime soon and smelling it herself for a length of time. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink https://t.co/yl71FtUnCf

Unfortunately for me I have a front row seat of Cell 1 at Walley‚Äôs Quarry from my bedroom window. Looks like an awful lot still needs capping in order to comply with your enforcement notice @RedIndustries2 , it‚Äôll be a busy 2 days... #stopthestink https://t.co/IKMi04JNpC

@sunnyraisin62 @AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Totally agree. This is damage limitation. A woman who desperately wants to keep her job as the press is getting more intense. She didn‚Äôt actually say anything really did she . It was just like a real time version of that letter we all received. I encourage a full investigation
Another night of stench in Thistleberry #WalleysQuarry  woke us up at 01:15am. Can‚Äôt see this being fixed by tomorrow! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/TlgSggoNNe

tweets.text:
Is this what putting "Pressure on the water industry to better protect the environment", looks like? 

@EnvAgency? https://t.co/GQpYeUQw1e

Things I thought I‚Äôd never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ‚Ä¶.

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It‚Äôs really nice to see nature so close to urban centres‚Ä¶.. it‚Äôs called @theoutdoorcity for a reason üôå https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT

Last week, we coordinated a national week of action to tackle #CatalyticConverter theft.

Police forces across the UK recovered over a thousand stolen catalytic converters and arrested more than 50 people.

üëâ https://t.co/HxdimFSzZC 

 @PoliceChiefs @TheNICRP https://t.co/pE0ipsYrdi

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids We‚Äôve asked you to meet face to face countless times. We‚Äôve asked for action. We‚Äôve called, emailed, protested... only now do you make a statement. I only hope your own family are never subjected to living conditions like this. We are helpless and overwhelmed with the stench.
@fayedavies @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Same here, woke up twice during the night & had to get up to close the window - again! Anyone losing sleep at @RedIndustries2?

@sunnyraisin62 @AaronBell4NUL @johncurtinEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 Yep üíØ sure on that one . It‚Äôs so obvious. And if you think about what would happen if that came out.... well , wouldn‚Äôt be pretty would it
@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock @StinkStopthe https://t.co/GkXSFCqxCt

4/5 We‚Äôve been speaking regularly but it was good to meet up with @AaronBell4NUL today. 

@EnvAgencyMids primary focus for #WalleysQuarry is @RedIndustries2 reducing odour so I was able to reassure him on behalf of his constituents that‚Äôs our priority. https://t.co/1zieoKZPsc

Thank You @philmackie !! Thank you @BBC @joe9tee @BBCRadio4 @BBCBreakfast We need people to see this. We need @EnvAgency @PHE_uk to take Immediate and URGENT action. Thank you so much. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/LXgIOvTUpu

tweets.text: @EnvAgency Air quality reports released today showing @RedIndustries2 Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill consistently & massively breaching WHO health and nuisance guideline levelsüëáSign the petition to ensure this does not happen ever again in the UK #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/bLpwh9eYa2

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.
